snippet: The couple said a judge told them he had seen research that children do better in heterosexual homes.
abstract: Utah Division of Child and Family Services announces it has filed motion to stay state Judge Scott Johansen's decision to compel April Hoagland and Rebecca Peirce to give up foster child who joined their household 3 months ago; Johansen ruled married couple cannot foster baby because they are lesbians, citing research he says shows children fare better in heterosexual homes.
lead_paragraph: The couple said a judge told them he had seen research that children do better in heterosexual homes.

headline.main: Utah Judge Orders Lesbian Couple to Give Up Foster Child
headline.print_headline: Gay Couple Is Ordered to Give Up Foster Child
